title: Stencil san serif
content:
Hi all,

Anyone know the name of the stencil type face shown in the poster?

Many thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014231638im_/http:/typophile.com/files/01_BIBI_31_03_5184.jpg)
author: Jem

comments.content:
[Stencil Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014231638/http:/www.dafont.com/stencil-gothic-be.font) by Brain Eaters Font Co. is a match. Lots of stencil fonts based on old stencils. Could be other fonts that also match.  
Hint: Crop your font image before posting.  
Don
Thanks Don, but the sleeping cat is the best bit ; )
As Don said, same design, other digitization: [Delivered](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014231638/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/delivered) by Jeff Levine

Nice. Thank guys, appreciate the help and advice.  
J
